AI Description: The RColorBrewer package is an R implementation of Cynthia Elaine Brewer's color schemes. These color schemes are designed to work well for choropleth maps and other data graphics.
Core Features:
1. Implementation of Cynthia Brewer's color schemes
2. Designed for creating visually appealing data graphics, specifically choropleth maps
3. Provides a variety of color palettes with different color combinations
General Tags: R Package, Color Schemes, Data Visualization
